title: Connecting to Keypress Events
description: In this lab, we will learn how to connect to keypress events in Matplotlib, which allows us to perform certain actions when a key is pressed. We will create a plot and set up a keypress event listener that will toggle the visibility of the x-label when the 'x' key is pressed.
